projects.name: Scrobble Quiz
projects.description: Test your music knowledge based on your Last.fm (music service) history! This  project uses both traditional ML and generative AI to generate relevant quiz questions for the user. I am hoping to add support for other music services in the future as well!

projects.name: Access Finder
projects.description: Discover and rate locations based on their accessibility features! I am currently actively working on this project and hoping to have a minimum viable product within the next few months

projects.name: Persona.fm
projects.description: A full stack Next.js application that uses the Last.FM API to show users snapshots of their listening habits. This project uses OpenAI's 4o mini model to generate information about a user's listening history on Last.fm for the last 7 days.

projects.name: Website
projects.description: My personal website (the one you are currently one). I maintain this as an open source project to help people get started with making their own portfolio websites.

projects.name: ChairSense
projects.description: For wheelchair users, it can be hard to see what's behind the chair, especially when backing up or turning, which can be dangerous because there is a high potential to hit an object or person. The aim of this project is to solve that problem by creating a low-cost device that can detect obstacles and warn the wheelchair user so they don't hit objects or people. A future goal is to test this out with other wheelchair users
